fixes.title: Game Won't Start with LSPDFR
steps: Verify GTA V launches without mods first
Ensure RagePluginHook is updated to latest version
Run RAGEPluginHook.exe as administrator
Check Windows Event Viewer for crash details
Temporarily move plugins folder to desktop and add back one by one

fixes.title: Game Crashes When Going On Duty
steps: Update LSPDFR to the latest version
Disable callout plugins and re-enable one by one
Check for conflicting vehicle mods
Verify ELS configuration if using ELS vehicles
Clear RagePluginHook cache folder

fixes.title: Poor FPS/Performance Issues
steps: Install Heap Adjuster and Packfile Limit Adjuster
Lower in-game graphics settings (especially MSAA, Shadows, Reflections)
Reduce number of active plugins
Limit backup units spawned
Disable unnecessary traffic and population multipliers
Close background applications

fixes.title: Plugins Not Loading
steps: Verify plugins are in correct folder (Grand Theft Auto V/plugins/LSPDFR)
Check RagePluginHook.log for specific errors
Ensure all plugin dependencies are installed
Verify .NET Framework 4.8 is installed
Check plugin is compatible with your LSPDFR version

fixes.title: In-Car Computer Not Working
steps: Verify you're in a police vehicle
Check that ComputerPlus or CompuLite is installed correctly
Review keybinds in plugin settings
Ensure no conflicting computer plugins are installed
Check RagePluginHook.log for errors

fixes.title: Traffic Stops Not Working Properly
steps: Update Stop The Ped to latest version
Check keybinds haven't changed
Ensure police vehicle has proper classification
Verify you're on duty in LSPDFR
Check for conflicting traffic interaction mods

fixes.title: ELS Lights Not Working
steps: Ensure ELS.dll is in plugins/LSPDFR folder
Verify vehicle has corresponding .xml file in ELS/pack_default
Check ELS.ini configuration
Ensure only one lighting mod is active (ELS conflicts with vanilla sirens)
Update ELS to latest version

fixes.title: No Callouts Appearing
steps: Ensure you're on duty (F4 by default)
Check callout plugins are enabled in RagePluginHook
Verify you're in a police vehicle
Wait 2-3 minutes for callouts to generate
Check RagePluginHook.log for callout-related errors

fixes.title: Backup Units Not Responding
steps: Wait longer - backup can take time to arrive
Ensure you're using correct backup keys (default Y, U, I)
Check traffic isn't blocking spawn points
Verify Ultimate Backup or similar plugin is installed and working
Try calling backup from different locations

fixes.title: RagePluginHook Freezing/Hanging
steps: Update to latest RagePluginHook version
Disable plugins one by one to identify cause
Clear RagePluginHook cache
Run as administrator
Check for Windows updates
